name: RUSSIAN VIP
description:
Welcome to the HARD BASS MAYEM : RUSSIAN VIP.

RUSSIAN VIP is  a top down shooter where you need to protect an RUSSIAN HARD BASS DJ from an army of hitmans. The game has local coop support if you have a  gamepad and friend.

The  game was made during the Ludum Dare 46 with the theme "Keep it alive".
